code:
defmodule Solution do
  @spec max_frequency_elements(nums :: [integer]) :: integer
  def max_frequency_elements(nums) do
    # Count the frequency of each element
    freq_map = Enum.reduce(nums, %{}, fn num, acc ->
      Map.update(acc, num, 1, &(&1 + 1))
    end)

    # Find the maximum frequency
    max_freq = freq_map |> Enum.map(fn {_num, freq} -> freq end) |> Enum.max()

    # Sum the frequencies of elements that have the maximum frequency
    freq_map
    |> Enum.filter(fn {_num, freq} -> freq == max_freq end)
    |> Enum.map(fn {_num, freq} -> freq end)
    |> Enum.sum()
  end
end
